acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift to the Library from William James Rucker, September 7, 1933.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Chiefly letters of prominent 19th century Virginians: John Randolph (1812); Andrew Jackson (1830); John Marshall (1831); Edwin Henry Landseer (1845); John C. Calhoun (1849); Edwin Henry Landseer (1851); Charles Dickens (1858); William Cabell Rives (1861); John Letcher (1862); Jefferson Davis (1864); J. E. B. Stuart (1864); Alexander H. H. Stuart (1866); John Letcher (1866); Gilbert C. Walker (1872); Joseph E. Johnston (1881); Fred W. M. Holliday (1881)
